price: 53. Waxay (malaa’igtii) yidhaahdeen: Ha nixin. Waxaan kuugu bishaareyn wiil aqoon leh (Isxaaq).
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
